Y0001 j-e
Z-A A particle which after the narrative present in -mui / -myi and the verb bui expresses presumption, probability, or hope. amuγulang saγatazu amui -- . [I] presume that [you] are in good health (epist. ). ... bui -- = ... biz-a. Most probably. iremyi -- . Will probably come. tere jabuγsan bui -- . [I ] presume that he must have gone. uciralduxu yly bolumui -- . Perhaps we shall not meet again.
1018

Did not make it in time; was [too] late γarcu jabun --tal-a. When [I] was just about to go out tarij-a xaduxu --zu baimui. [We] are about to harvest the crops tyme --zu baimui. ZABSAR n. Gap, interstice, slit; crevasse,fissure; hiatus b) Interval, time between, pause, intermission, break. c) fig. Weakness, blemish, fault, loophole. -- a = -- tur. In between; in the crevasse. See also b. -- un ysyg. Clerkly style of Chinese writing used in formal documents (Ch. li-shu). -- ygei. Without a gap, cleft, or fissure. γazar un -- . A crevice in the ground. tere xojar un -- tu . Between those two. xaγalγa anu -- ygei neileldyky. The gate shuts firmly. zai -- ygei. Having no space or gap. --a = -- tur. During, meanwhile, in between. See also a. -- cilyge. Leisure, free time; favorable occasion, favorable time. ene -- . During this time, meanwhile. tere -- . In the meantime. -- eriky. To look for a weak spot.
